meanings.definition: a type of large fish commonly found in tropical and subtropical waters.
meanings.sent1: The marlins swam gracefully in the clear blue ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of marlins while snorkeling in Hawaii.
meanings.sent3: The marlins decided to have a race to see who was the fastest swimmer.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was as strong as a marlin swimming against the current.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the marlins sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: the name of a professional baseball team based in Miami, Florida.
meanings.sent1: The Marlins won the championship last year.
meanings.sent2: I bought a cap with the Marlins logo on it.
meanings.sent3: The Marlins players celebrated their victory with a dance-off.
meanings.sent4: Her love for the Marlins was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The cheers of the crowd filled the stadium as the Marlins scored the winning run.
